label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_014
content:
## 2024-06-03 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 108
- Active: 100
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 38
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 8

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 36
- Standard: 36
- Placebo: 36

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.6
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.2
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 33.7
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 8.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 346.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 54.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 25.7
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.1
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.4
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.4
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 3.7
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.3

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.8
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.9
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 44.4
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 7.7
- Standard Six MWT (meters) Mean: 298.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) SD: 47.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 22.8
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.4
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.5
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.4
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.8
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.3

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.5
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.1
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 48.5
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 5.7
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) Mean: 266.0
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) SD: 44.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 20.4
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.1
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 3.7
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.7
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.5

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 222
- Sessions Attended: 197
- Attendance Rate (%): 88.8

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 14.0
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.0
- WBC (k) Mean: 7.5
- WBC (k) SD: 1.5
- Platelets (k) Mean: 258
- Platelets (k) SD: 48
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 1.0
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.14
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 89.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 11.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 18.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 5.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-1453, Description: pruritus, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1403, Description: pruritus, Grade: 2, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1417, Description: fatigue, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1436, Description: diaphoresis, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-1407, Description: VAS assessment outside scheduled window, Severity: minor
- PD ID: PM-PD-1447, Description: VAS assessment outside scheduled window, Severity: minor

### Events
- Pain diary electronic collection rate: 86%
- Rescue medication supply restocked at 29 sites
- Opioid conversion table reference updated per FDA guidance

### Notes
- Week 14: Pain management assessments on track. 108 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
